message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CC

The paper discusses the development of a neural network model that incorporates the diffuse projections from the limbic system to the cortex, which is a significant feature of the structure of the brain. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of artificial neural networks (ANNs) to model this effect, which suggests that it could also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the interactions between salience and regular processing, which suggests that it could belong to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the adaptation of ANNs to respond to an input salience signal, which suggests that it could also belong to the Computational Complexity (cs.CC) sub-category.
